headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Hershey (HSY) After Its Mixed Five Year Share Price Run?
summary: If you are wondering whether Hershey at around US$189.97 a share is still a fair deal or starting to look stretched, you are not alone. The stock has had mixed returns, with a 3.9% decline over the last 7 days, a 3.1% gain over the last 30 days, a 4.1% gain year to date, a 27.6% gain over 1 year, a 7.7% decline over 3 years, and a 47.5% gain over 5 years. Recent attention on Hershey has focused on how the stock price lines up with its fundamentals and long term track record, as investors...
